architectural_design.description: Modern, two-story 6BHK farmhouse with total area of 2000 sqft. Includes a rooftop terrace, private gym, central courtyard, adhering to local building norms and Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Mudroom / Entrance
rooms.description: Entry with cloak room and storage. Aligned per entrance axis as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open space connecting to central courtyard for natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to kitchen area, ensuring easy flow of energy as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with efficient layout, preferably in the southeast corner following Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Spacious guest bedroom with attached bathroom. Positioned to receive good sunlight and view of courtyard.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Attached to Guest Bedroom 1 for convenience.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: Open space that flows into the living area, enhancing natural ventilation and light. Acts as a communal space with landscaping and water element.

rooms.name: Utility Room / Laundry
rooms.description: Functional room for household utilities, located away from main living spaces.

openings.note: Aligned with Vastu principles to welcome positive energy.
Large windows for natural lighting and ventilation.
Provides seamless connection between indoor and outdoor spaces.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and private balcony overlooking the courtyard.

rooms.name: En Suite Bathroom (Master)
rooms.description: Well-designed bathroom for privacy and convenience.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with natural light access. Vastu alignment ensures positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Sufficient space for family members or additional needs.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Dedicated gym area with adequate ventilation and sound insulation. Located in the southwest corner as per Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace Access
rooms.description: Staircase leading to a private rooftop terrace. The terrace is designed for relaxation and outdoor living.

openings.note: Provides private outdoor space with views of the landscape.
Ensures safe and comfortable access to rooftop terrace.

rooftop_terrace.description: Modern outdoor space with a green roof, seating area, and potential for water features or garden elements.

central_courtyard.description: Central open space that ties together the design of both floors. Incorporates landscaping to promote serenity as per Vastu principles.

notes: All dimensions and layouts are approximate and conceptual. Final designs should be refined by an architect with local expertise, considering site-specific constraints and updated building codes.
